description: Append d digits d after each digit d in decimal expansion of n.
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
prog: (Haskell)import Data.Char (digitToInt)a048377 :: Integer -> Integera048377 n =   read $ concat $ zipWith replicate (map ((+ 1) . digitToInt) ns) ns      where ns = show n-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jul 10 2011
author: _Patrick De Geest_, Mar 15 1999.
